column4: hi, i just installed lampp and i need to copy over a php file into my htdocs folder, but it says i dont own that folder so it will not let me paste. help.
then what use is the file browser if you cant copy paste?
- yes and If not already done do it on the console
- with nautilus it won't work (as far as I know, becaus u have to start nautilus with sudo rights to gain access to "root-protected" files & folder)
- so it is easier to do it with the console
